nc:Activity.nc:ActivityDescriptionText: Ms. Johnson (Victim 1) was leaving her office party on 11/2/2006 at 1:30am. As she walked down 12 High Street, a man approached her wearing a ski mask pushed Ms. Johnson down to the ground and raped her. After raping Ms. Johnson, the subject ran away. Ms. Johnson provided details about the subject to a police sketch artist.

ansi-nist:PhysicalFeatureDescriptionDeta.ansi-nist:PhysicalFeatureDescriptionText: Tattoo of a help icon on the subjects arm
Tattoo of a warning icon on the subjects arm

lexs:AttachmentLink.nc:BinaryDescriptionText: Sketch of rapist (image is of Herman Munster)
